K-best transformation synchronization.1: Based on this fact, convex optimization techniques formulate map synchronization as solving a constrained low-rank matrix recovery problem [24,42,4,15,13,8,29, 33,10], where the input matrix encodes the input maps, and the recovered matrix describes the cycle-consistent maps.
